description: React component ‘DeviceDetails’ displaying device information with API interactions for fetching device data and pinging the device.

methods.name: DeviceDetails
methods.description: React functional component that displays detailed information for a specific device, including functionality to load data and ping the device.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads device data using getDevice API call and manages loading/error states.

methods.name: doPing
methods.description: Performs a ping to the device using pingDevice API and updates UI with the result.
